title: Hushed Whispers - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Body Swap   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cold Love Interests   Cold Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Female to Male   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Male to Female   Mature Protagonist   Multiple Protagonists   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Past Plays a Big Role   Personality Changes   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Race Change   Sharp-tongued Characters   Student-Teacher Relationship   Time Travel   Transported to Another World
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
Having woken up one morning, Lin Qingyu discovered that she had transformed into a man……

She was elated beyond words;

Similarly, having woken up one morning, Su Yian discovered that he transformed into a…… tree…

He was devastated beyond words;

And to add to his sufferings

There was a boy (or was it a girl?) who climbed every night into his navel — his tree hole...

To confide in him those secrets: the hidden excitements, the worries and the sadness.

All in hushed whispers,

For him to hear.

'Such a bastard!'>
